member.name: P:Shareware.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager

member.name: P:Shareware.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Shareware.FileDirSearcher.GetFiles(System.String,System.IO.SearchOption,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the files those matches the criteria inside the specified directory and/or sub-directories.
member.param: The root directory path to search for files.
The searching mode.
The file name pattern(s) to match.
The file extension pattern(s) to match.
If True, ignores the comparing case of and patterns.
Determines whether exceptions will be thrown, like access denied to file or directory.
member.returns: An instance containing the files information.
